enemyTemplates.Name: Shadow Lurker
enemyTemplates.SpecialAttack: The Shadow Lurker envelops its target in darkness, reducing their vision.

enemyTemplates.Name: Time Wraith
enemyTemplates.SpecialAttack: The Time Wraith distorts time around its foe, slowing their movements drastically.

enemyTemplates.Name: Ethereal Assassin
enemyTemplates.SpecialAttack: The Ethereal Assassin disappears before delivering a deadly strike from the shadows.

enemyTemplates.Name: Ancient Guardian
enemyTemplates.SpecialAttack: The Ancient Guardian summons the power of the ancients to protect itself and attack its enemies.

enemyTemplates.Name: Void Beast
enemyTemplates.SpecialAttack: The Void Beast unleashes a chaotic energy blast, causing massive damage.
